h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: How to Find the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
content: From The Emerald Hall Keeper's Shrine, go left and up the stairs. A cutscene will start to , where you'll transform into a Cicada and fly toward the center of the hall. This is where you'll find Pingping speaking to her mother, Rakshasi, accompanied by the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish'.
The content is as follows:
From The Emerald Hall Keeper's Shrine, go left and up the stairs. A cutscene will start to , where you'll transform into a Cicada and fly toward the center of the hall. This is where you'll find Pingping speaking to her mother, Rakshasi, accompanied by the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains.
